name: Catalist: The Sages Song
description:
Sage's Song is a short sweet minigame that is part of Catalist. Travel to a magical world filled with fantastical Cats, music and drama. Here you will meet Hal and listen to his song as he comes to grips with adulthood.

Sage's Song is a rhythm minigame developed The Boss Cat LLC by Daniel St George, Kanesha Bryan, Katherine Diaz, Kentaro "ANI" Fujimoto. Music composed by Johnny Mackay and lyrics by Supatrubolocity

The game will released November 2015.
